page.title: 08Leisure activities
page.content: Cinemas and theatres exist{outside}the area so it is neccessary to travel to{ {Brighton}or{Worthing }for these. Lack of public transport makes this difficult for the young.{Amateur {dramatic}groups put on plays in the Women's Hall.A{Social Club}is open to those over 18 every night for{ {snooker,darts,bingo etc.}Popular meeting places are{pubs.}The{wine bar} &{restaurants}have regular clienteles. Other organisations include{local {history, horticultural, & bell-ringing societies as well as{cubs, brownies, {scouts & guides}for children.There are {Mother & Toddler}and{playgroups}to provide pre-school experience for kids & a break for mothers! Local sports clubs{(Football,Cricket,Bowls,Tennis)} are well-supported.Summer activities centre around fetes organised by business men's clubs like{'Lions'.}
